org.gridgain.grid.marshaller
Class GridMarshallerExclusions

java.lang.Object
  org.gridgain.grid.marshaller.GridMarshallerExclusions

public final class GridMarshallerExclusions
extends Object

Controls what classes should be excluded from marshalling by default.
